name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DraftLab: Write better emails faster with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fight writer's block and hit inbox zero. DraftLab is an AI-powered Gmail copilot that generates high-quality email replies for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DraftLab helps Gmail users fight writer's block and hit inbox zero by using AI to generate high-quality email responses automatically.
